fields.author: Charles Mingus
fields.quote: Making the simple complicated is commonplace; making the complicated simple, awesomely simple, that's creativity.
fields.title: Mingus - Making the complicated simple

fields.author: William Plomer
fields.quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
fields.title: Plomer - Creativity is the power to connect.

fields.author: Scott Adams
fields.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
fields.title: Adams - Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes

fields.quote: Love your reusable app, but wish there were some docs.
fields.author: Jane Shmoe
fields.teaser: Love the app... wish there were docs.
